id: {Player} decides to head to the nearest town

onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} followed the forest path toward {TownName}, sunlight flickering through the trees. Signs of travelers appeared along the way, from bootprints to cart tracks to a torn cloak.

As the woods thinned, a busy road came into view, filled with merchants and wanderers. Voices mixed with the sound of carts and hooves on the ground.

At the gates, {Player} found the town alive with movement, vendors calling out, children laughing, and the scent of bread and spice filling the air. He paused for a moment, then stepped forward into {TownName}.
